DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized control study evaluate feasibility safety early steroid withdrawal 6mg/kg v 4.5mg/kg Thymoglobulin induction therapy kidney transplantation . Patients enrol June , 2015 24 month . They randomize either 6mg/kg 4.5mg/kg Thymoglobulin induction group . Steroid withdrawal do within one week kidney transplantation patient . Maintenance immunosuppressant Tacrolimus Mycophenolate mofetil ( Myfortic ) . Primary outcome composite biopsy-proven acute rejection , delay graft function , graft loss death within one year post transplant .
